attributes.deffile:
Bootstrap: shub
From: ISU-HPC/centos7-base

%help
CentOS 7 with base perl and CPAN


%labels
    Maintainer Iowa State University High-Performance Computing Group
    Version  v1.0


%setup


%files


%post
    # Install Perl prerequisites
    yum install -y epel-release
    yum install -y perl perl-CPAN perl-App-cpanminus perl-Archive-Tar perl-Want perl-TermReadKey
attributes.help: CentOS 7 with base perl and CPAN

labels.MAINTAINER: Iowa State University High-Performance Computing Group

attributes.environment: # Custom environment shell code should follow
attributes.runscript:
#!/bin/sh

echo "There is no runscript defined for this container\n";
